questions.question: Which sensor is commonly used to measure the distance to an object in Arduino projects?

explanations.a: PIR sensors are used for motion detection, not for measuring distances.
explanations.b: DHT sensors are used to measure temperature and humidity, not distance.
explanations.c: Ultrasonic sensors are commonly used for measuring the distance to an object by emitting sound waves.
explanations.d: Soil Moisture sensors measure the moisture level in the soil, not distance.

questions.question: Which sensor is primarily used for detecting motion in Arduino projects?

explanations.a: MQ135 is used for air quality detection, not for motion detection.
explanations.b: PIR sensors are specifically designed to detect motion by sensing infrared radiation.
explanations.c: Soil Moisture sensors detect soil moisture levels, not motion.
explanations.d: Ultrasonic sensors are used for measuring distances, not for detecting motion.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the DHT sensor in Arduino projects?

explanations.a: DHT sensors do not measure distance, they measure temperature and humidity.
explanations.b: DHT sensors are not used to measure air quality; MQ135 sensors are used for that purpose.
explanations.c: DHT sensors are designed to measure both temperature and humidity in the environment.
explanations.d: Motion detection is typically handled by PIR sensors, not DHT sensors.

questions.question: Which sensor can be used to measure soil moisture levels in an Arduino-based garden monitoring system?

explanations.a: MQ135 sensors are used to detect air quality, not soil moisture.
explanations.b: Soil Moisture sensors are specifically designed to measure the moisture content of soil in gardening systems.
explanations.c: Ultrasonic sensors measure distance, not soil moisture.
explanations.d: PIR sensors detect motion, not soil moisture.

questions.question: Which sensor is used to detect air quality, specifically the presence of gases like CO2, in Arduino projects?

explanations.a: DHT sensors measure temperature and humidity, not air quality.
explanations.b: MQ135 sensors are designed to detect air quality and gases like CO2, ammonia, and alcohol.
explanations.c: Ultrasonic sensors measure distance, not air quality.
explanations.d: Soil Moisture sensors are used for detecting soil moisture, not air quality.
